page.title: 19CARLTON POLICE
page.content: {Carlton has no police station.}But at the shopping precinct at Long Lane there is a{Police Contact Point.}Five police constables patrol Carlton they also patrol{Oldcotes}and{Langold.}They are supervised by {Harworth}and { {Worksop}sergeants.If there are more serious incidents,they have support from the {Criminal Investigation {Department}and{Traffic Division.}The constables Police the area on{foot, {bycicle}or{motor vehicle,}depending on what they are doing.Between 1st of January and 20th of June 1985,{195 {crimes were committed.}There were{59 {thefts,33 burglaries,14 cycle {thefts,13 acts of criminal damage, {value of Â£20,8 instances of people {taking cars unlawfully. { }
